Name of additional file(s) accompanying the data. The file(s) provide, for example, the name of any raw files generated by the instrument, generated reports from a vendor, an Rscript, or an instructions document. The files can be instrument raw files, converted peak lists such as mzML, MGF, or result files like mzIdentML.
